basic_information.scholarship_notes: Committee members= representatives from the Alpha Gamma Delta Alumni Chapter

description: To provide scholarships for an active collegiate member of the Epsilon Nu chapter of Alpha Gamma Delta in good standing. **If you are NOT an active collegiate member of the EN Chapter of Alpha Gamma Delta and in good standing you are not eligible to receive this scholarship.** Eligibility Requirements Must be a Junior or Senior in the upcoming fall semester; Minimum cumulative GPA of 2.5, Be an undergraduate, full-time student, Be a member of Alpha Gamma Delta in good standing. This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is Junior   or SIS_Classification is Senior
